page.title: 06Marple Carnival.
page.content: Every year in mid-June{Marple {Carnival}is held.It is a great occasion when all the family can have a good day out.We had a word with Mr. Burton,one of the organisers,he explained that all the money raised is given to the{local charities. Each year the total amount raised depends on the weather. If it is fine then more money is collected.He also said "The total amounts raised are very different each year. For instance, one year they raised Â£800 and the next Â£3000." He told us that the carnival had been going for 23 years,{since 1962.}We asked him if he knew anything about the fair,held after the carnival,in Brabyns Park. He told us that it comes to Marple each year as long as there is a carnival.
